item.description:
• Release packaging now includes DMG output for this version.
  • Added manual Timeline snapshot capture with clear permission/status warnings and instant refresh when a snapshot saves, plus an option to remove recent activity entries.
  • Introduced a global Pause/Resume Focus shortcut and smarter focus monitoring that pauses on sleep and resumes on wake.
  • Tracked task completion timestamps so completed-today views and task updates reflect when work actually finished.
  • Refined music handling with safer media-key swallowing, in-task previous/next controls, and a brief hint when music starts.
  • UI tweaks: added a settings theme preview, kept completed tasks limited to today, and adjusted workday hours handling in task scheduling.
  • Added a focus window tooltip reminder for right-click options.
